meanings.sent1: When faced with a strong wind, the tree yieldeth and bends gracefully.
meanings.sent2: During the negotiation, he yieldeth to the demands of his opponent.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn door yieldeth at last to the gentle push.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of wills, patience yieldeth victory.
meanings.sent5: The river yieldeth to the persistence of the determined swimmer.

meanings.sent1: The apple tree yieldeth a bountiful harvest every autumn.
meanings.sent2: The factory yieldeth a steady stream of products for the market.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand yieldeth endless surprises with each wave.
meanings.sent4: The fertile soil yieldeth crops that sustain the village.
meanings.sent5: The hardworking bee yieldeth sweet honey for the hive.

meanings.sent1: The kind teacher yieldeth extra time for the students to complete the test.
meanings.sent2: The rules yieldeth exceptions for special circumstances.
meanings.sent3: The open gate yieldeth easy access to the garden.
meanings.sent4: The flexible schedule yieldeth opportunities for spontaneous adventures.
meanings.sent5: The understanding boss yieldeth a supportive work environment for the team.
